languages.text: {n}Запрокинув голову, воин издает леденящий душу вой, в котором слышатся безумное веселье злых духов, пляшущих на смертоносных ледяных отрогах. Кровожадная улыбка расцветает на его лице.{/n} "Так как, говоришь, тебя зовут?"

{n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"
languages.original_text: {n}Запрокинув голову, воин издает леденящий душу вой, в котором слышатся безумное веселье злых духов, пляшущих на смертоносных ледяных отрогах. Кровожадная улыбка расцветает на его лице.{/n} "Так как, говоришь, тебя зовут?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

{n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

{n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

{n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

languages.text: {n}他向后甩着头，发出了令人毛骨悚然的嚎叫声。如此疯狂的笑声，仿佛仿佛只有在冰冷的高崖上跳舞的恶灵才能发得出来。随后，他的脸上露出了掠夺意味的笑容。{/n}“你刚刚说，你叫什么来着？”
languages.original_text: {n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他向后甩着头，发出了令人毛骨悚然的嚎叫声。如此疯狂的笑声，仿佛仿佛只有在冰冷的高崖上跳舞的恶灵才能发得出来。随后，他的脸上露出了掠夺意味的笑容。{/n}“你刚刚说，你叫什么来着？”

languages.text: {n}彼は頭を後ろへ倒し、凍てつく崖の上で踊る悪霊のような狂気の咆哮をあげた。その顔には捕食者のような笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「名はなんだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は頭を後ろへ倒し、凍てつく崖の上で踊る悪霊のような狂気の咆哮をあげた。その顔には捕食者のような笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「名はなんだ？」

languages.text: {n}Echando atrás la cabeza, suelta un aullido helador que encierra el desquiciado júbilo de los espíritus malignos bailando al borde de un precipicio helado. Una sonrisa de depredador aparece en su cara.{/n} «¿Cómo ha dicho que se llamaba?».
languages.original_text: {n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Echando atrás la cabeza, suelta un aullido helador que encierra el desquiciado júbilo de los espíritus malignos bailando al borde de un precipicio helado. Una sonrisa de depredador aparece en su cara.{/n} «¿Cómo ha dicho que se llamaba?».

languages.text: {n}Il jette la tête en arrière et pousse un hurlement à glacer le sang, dans lequel vous avez l'impression d'entendre les rires dérangés d'esprits malveillants qui danseraient au bord d'une falaise gelée. Un sourire carnassier se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Comment vous avez dit vous appeler ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il jette la tête en arrière et pousse un hurlement à glacer le sang, dans lequel vous avez l'impression d'entendre les rires dérangés d'esprits malveillants qui danseraient au bord d'une falaise gelée. Un sourire carnassier se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Comment vous avez dit vous appeler ? »

languages.text: {n}Er wirft den Kopf zurück und heult, dass einem das Blut in den Aderns erstarren könnte, mit der wahnsinnigen Fröhlichkeit böser Geister, die auf einer eisigen Klippe tanzen.. Ein raubtierhaftes Grinsen erscheint auf seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Wie war gleich noch mal Euer Name?"
languages.original_text: {n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er wirft den Kopf zurück und heult, dass einem das Blut in den Aderns erstarren könnte, mit der wahnsinnigen Fröhlichkeit böser Geister, die auf einer eisigen Klippe tanzen.. Ein raubtierhaftes Grinsen erscheint auf seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Wie war gleich noch mal Euer Name?"

languages.original_text: {n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

languages.text: {n}Kafasını geriye doğru atarak kan dondurucu bir şekilde uluyor. Buzlu bir uçurumda dans eden kötü ruhların delicesine neşesini içeren uluma... Yüzünde avcılara layık bir sırıtış beliriyor.{/n} "Adım ne demiştin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Throwing back his head, he lets out a blood-chilling howl, one that contains the deranged mirth of evil spirits dancing on an icy cliff. A predatory grin blooms on his face.{/n} "What did you say your name was?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kafasını geriye doğru atarak kan dondurucu bir şekilde uluyor. Buzlu bir uçurumda dans eden kötü ruhların delicesine neşesini içeren uluma... Yüzünde avcılara layık bir sırıtış beliriyor.{/n} "Adım ne demiştin?"
